<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>This probe fetches the following information

1.) service now version
2.) nuvolo products installed and nuvolo version
3.) Domain separated?</description><healthcheck_type/><name>General Info</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

//Fetching ServiceNow version
var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
gr1.addEncodedQuery('name=mid.version');
gr1.query();
if (gr1.next()) {
   var serviceNowVersion = gr1.value.substr(0,gr1.value.indexOf('-'));
}

//Fetching Nuvolo products installed and its version
var nuvoloProduct=[];
var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
gr2.addEncodedQuery('scopeLIKEx_nuvo^active=True');
gr2.query();
while (gr2.next()) {
     nuvoloProduct.push(gr2.name + ' : '+gr2.version+'\n');
}

//Fetching whether the instance id domain separated or not
var gr3 = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
gr3.addEncodedQuery('nameLIKEx_nuvo_dse');
gr3.query();
var domainSeparated3 ="";
if(gr3.getRowCount() >= 1)
{
 domainSeparated3 = 'The instance has Domain Separation Integration';
}
else
{
domainSeparated3 = 'The instance is not Domain Separated';
}

util.handleOutput('The ServiceNow version : '+serviceNowVersion+' \n\n Nuvolo products installed and their versions : '+nuvoloProduct.toString()+ ' \n\n'+domainSeparated3,'warning', 'ServiceNow');]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jake.ye@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 19:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ce99c1cdbf851505f598b05059619fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>General Info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_7ce99c1cdbf851505f598b05059619fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
